story.text:
Steve (Stephen R.) Palmer was the development manager on the project in Singapore where [[Peter Coad]] first discovered the benefits of object modeling in color and [[Jeff De Luca]] first wrote down the five processes that have become known as [[Feature Driven Development]]. 
[[Jeff De Luca]] was the project manager and [[Peter Coad]] the object modeling guru on the project.

Steve is based in the [[United Kingdom]], in Exmouth, Devon to be exact, and now works for hybris ([http://www.hybris.com www.hybris.com]). He still writes about modeling in color and [[Feature Driven Development]] at his own website [http://www.step-10.com www.step-10.com]
